manageOgreLetter(Board) - Method in class dungeon.logic.Ogre
 
moveCharacter(Board) - Method in class dungeon.logic.Character
Changes the coordinates of the characters according the moving direction, if the movement is valid
moveClub(Board) - Method in class dungeon.logic.Ogre
Establishes a random position for the club.
moveGuard(Board) - Method in class dungeon.logic.Drunken
Moves the Drunken character in the board.
moveGuard(Board) - Method in class dungeon.logic.Guard
 
moveGuard(Board) - Method in class dungeon.logic.Rookie
Moves the Rookie and establishes his lethal tiles (tiles that kill the hero)
moveGuard(Board) - Method in class dungeon.logic.Suspicious
Moves the Suspicious, and randomly makes him switch direction for a while (the probability of taking the normal route is higher than the probability of taking the inverse route)
moveHero(char, Board, int) - Method in class dungeon.logic.Hero
Moves the hero according the the user input.
moveOgre(Board, Hero) - Method in class dungeon.logic.Ogre
Moves the ogre and his club.
movingDirection(char) - Method in class dungeon.logic.Hero
Associates the user input with a specific moving direction for the hero
movingDirection() - Method in class dungeon.logic.Ogre
Establishes a ramdom direction for the ogre
